***Size does matter***

The goal of this package is to provide utilities to work with indices of effect size and standardized parameters, allowing computation and conversion of indices such as Cohen's *d*, *r*, odds, etc.


## Installation


Run the following:
```{r eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("easystats/effectsize")
```
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library("effectsize")
```

# Features

## Standardization

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)

iris %>% 
  standardize(robust = TRUE) %>% 
  summary(digits = 1)
```


```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
iris %>% 
  normalize() %>% 
  summary(digits = 1)
```

## Computation

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
standardize_parameters(lm(Sepal.Length ~ Species, data = iris))
```

## Interpretation

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
interpret_d(d = 0.5)
```

## Conversion

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
convert_d_to_r(d = 1)
```
